actions.name: Mental Herb
actions.description:
Trigger: The user possesses @Affliction[charmed], @Affliction[enraged], @Affliction[taunted], @Affliction[fear], @Affliction[disabled], @Affliction[nullified],  @Affliction[suppressed], or is affected by Torment.
Effect: The user is cured of any and all of these Afflictions.
